statements: SELECT * FROM energy_technologies
SELECT technology_name, energy_saving_rating, manufacturer_name FROM energy_technologies WHERE technology_id = 1
SELECT technology_name, release_date FROM energy_technologies WHERE energy_saving_rating > 4.5
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) as total_technologies FROM energy_technologies GROUP BY manufacturer_name
SELECT * FROM energy_technologies ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT technology_name, energy_saving_rating, manufacturer_name, release_date FROM energy_technologies WHERE energy_saving_rating > 0.5 ORDER BY technology_name ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_technologies WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT technology_name, energy_saving_rating FROM energy_technologies WHERE manufacturer_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY energy_saving_rating DESC
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_technologies FROM energy_technologies GROUP BY manufacturer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_technologies DESC
SELECT technology_name, energy_saving_rating FROM energy_technologies WHERE technology_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY technology_id ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_technologies;
SELECT technology_name, energy_saving_rating FROM energy_technologies ORDER BY energy_saving_rating DESC;
SELECT technology_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_technologies JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_technologies.technology_id = energy_consumption.technology_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE date_recorded = '2022-01-15';
SELECT technology_name, energy_saving_rating FROM energy_technologies WHERE energy_saving_rating > 50 ORDER BY technology_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_technologies;
SELECT technology_id, technology_name FROM energy_technologies ORDER BY technology_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT technology_name, energy_saving_rating FROM energy_technologies WHERE energy_saving_rating > 5;
SELECT consumption_id, energy_consumed, date_recorded FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT technology_id, technology_name, energy_consumed, date_recorded FROM energy_technologies INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_technologies.technology_id = energy_consumption.technology_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergySavingTechnologies;
SELECT technology_name, efficiency_rating FROM EnergySavingTechnologies ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_kwh > 100;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_result FROM EnergyAssessment WHERE assessment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT technology_name, efficiency_rating FROM EnergySavingTechnologies WHERE efficiency_rating < 0.75;
SELECT * FROM EnergySavingTechnologies ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT technology_name, efficiency_rating FROM EnergySavingTechnologies WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption_kwh BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY consumption_kwh DESC;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_result FROM EnergyAssessment ORDER BY assessment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT et.technology_name, ea.assessment_result FROM EnergySavingTechnologies et INNER JOIN EnergyAssessment ea ON et.id = ea.technology_id WHERE ea.assessment_result = 'Passed';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT technology_name, energy_saved FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY technology_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT technology_id, SUM(energy_saved) AS total_energy_saved FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY technology_id HAVING total_energy_saved > 500;
SELECT e.technology_name, s.efficiency_rating FROM EnergySavings s JOIN EnergyConsumption e ON s.technology_id = e.technology_id WHERE s.saving_amount > 200 ORDER BY s.saving_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT technology_name, energy_saved FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY energy_saved DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyUsage WHERE usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT saving_amount, saving_date FROM EnergySavings WHERE saving_amount < 500 ORDER BY saving_date DESC;
SELECT efficiency_rating, efficiency_date FROM EnergyEfficiency WHERE technology_id = 3 AND efficiency_rating > 4 ORDER BY efficiency_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption LIMIT 10;
SELECT ec_id, ec_power_consumed, ec_date FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE ec_power_consumed > 100;
SELECT eed_name, eed_category, eed_manufacturer FROM EnergyEfficiencyDevices ORDER BY eed_name ASC;
SELECT es_power_saved, es_date, es_units FROM EnergySavings WHERE es_power_saved >= 50 AND es_units = 'kWh';
SELECT eed_name, eed_year_of_manufacture FROM EnergyEfficiencyDevices WHERE eed_year_of_manufacture BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY eed_year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyDevices;
SELECT eed_name, eed_category FROM EnergyEfficiencyDevices ORDER BY eed_category DESC, eed_name ASC;
SELECT eed_name, eed_manufacturer, eed_year_of_manufacture FROM EnergyEfficiencyDevices WHERE eed_year_of_manufacture > 2015;
SELECT es_power_saved, es_date FROM EnergySavings WHERE es_power_saved > 100 ORDER BY es_date DESC;
SELECT eed_name, ec_power_consumed, ec_units FROM EnergyEfficiencyDevices JOIN EnergyConsumption ON EnergyEfficiencyDevices.eed_id = EnergyConsumption.eed_id WHERE ec_power_consumed < 50;
